description.english: Finish the Prologue.
description.german: Schließ den Prolog ab.
description.french: Terminez le prologue
description.italian: Concludi il prologo.
description.spanish: Acaba el prólogo.

description.english: Complete Chapter 1.
description.german: Schließ Akt 1 ab.
description.french: Terminez l'acte 1
description.italian: Concludi l'atto 1.
description.spanish: Acaba el primer acto.

description.english: Complete Chapter 2.
description.german: Schließ Akt 2 ab.
description.french: Terminez l'acte 2
description.italian: Concludi l'atto 2.
description.spanish: Acaba el segundo acto.

description.english: Finish the game while playing at the Insane difficulty level.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel im Schwierigkeitsgrad Wahnsinnig ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode Suicidaire.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco al livello di difficoltà Folle.
description.spanish: Acaba el juego en el nivel de dificultad Loca.
description.russian: Пройти игру на Безумном уровне сложности.

description.english: Finish the game at any difficulty level.
description.german: Schließ das Spiel in einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu à quelque niveau de difficulté que ce soit.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco a qualsiasi livello di difficoltà.
description.spanish: Acaba el juego en cualquier nivel de dificultad.
description.russian: Закончить игру на любом уровне сложности.

displayName.english: Oh My God! You Killed the Kayran! You Bastards!
displayName.german: Oh mein Gott! Ihr habt den Kayran getötet! Ihr Schweine!
displayName.french: Oh mon Dieu ! Ils ont tué le keyran ! Espèce d'enfoirés !
displayName.italian: Hanno ucciso il Kayran! Brutti bastardi!
displayName.russian: О господи! Они убили кейрана! Сволочи!

description.english: Kill the kayran.
description.german: Töte den Kayran.
description.french: Tuez le keyran.
description.italian: Elimina il kayran.
description.spanish: Mata al kayran.

description.english: Kill the draug.
description.german: Töte den Draug.
description.french: Tuez le draugr
description.italian: Elimina il draug.
description.spanish: Mata al draug.

displayName.french: Dans la peau du Sorceleur George

description.english: Kill the dragon.
description.german: Töte den Drachen.
description.french: Tuez le dragon.
description.italian: Elimina il drago.
description.spanish: Mata al dragón.

description.english: Craft a suit of armor from elements of the kayran's carapace.
description.german: Fertige eine Rüstung aus den Elementen des Kayran-Panzers an.
description.french: Produisez une armure à partir de carapace de keyran.
description.italian: Crea un'armatura dal carapace del kayran.
description.spanish: Fabrica una armadura con los elementos del caparazón del kayran.
description.russian: Создать комплект доспехов из панциря кейрана.

description.english: Cut off a tentacle using the kayran trap.
description.german: Trenne mithilfe der Kayranfalle einen Tentakel ab.
description.french: Couper un tentacule à l'aide du piège à keyran.
description.italian: Mozza i tentacoli del mostro del fiume usando la trappola per kayran.
description.spanish: Corta un tentáculo usando la trampa para kayran.
description.russian: Отрубить щупальце с помощью ловушки на кейрана.

description.english: Achieve character level 35.
description.german: Erreiche Charakterlevel 35.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 35.
description.italian: Porta il tuo personaggio al livello 35.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 35 del personaje.

description.english: Acquire the Mutant ability.
description.german: Erwirb die Fertigkeit Mutant.
description.french: Obtenez la compétence Mutant.
description.italian: Ottieni l'abilità Mutante.
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad Mutante.

description.english: Acquire the Sense of Magic ability.
description.german: Erwirb die Fertigkeit Magiesinn.
description.french: Obtenez la compétence Sens de la Magie.
description.italian: Ottieni l'abilità Senso magico.
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad Sentido mágico.

description.english: Acquire the Combat Acumen ability.
description.german: Erwirb die Fertigkeit Kampfsinn.
description.french: Obtenez la compétence Sens du Combat.
description.italian: Ottieni l'abilità Senso del combattimento.
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad Agudeza en combate.

description.english: Achieve character level 10.
description.german: Erreiche Charakterlevel 10.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 10.
description.italian: Porta il tuo personaggio al livello 10.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 10 del personaje.

description.english: Hire a craftsman to create an item.
description.german: Beauftrage einen Handwerker mit der Herstellung eines Gegenstands.
description.french: Engagez un artisan pour créer un objet.
description.italian: Assolda un artigiano per creare un oggetto.
description.spanish: Contrata a un artesano para crear un objeto.
description.russian: Нанять ремесленника и создать с его помощью предмет.

description.english: Use alchemy to brew five potions or oils.
description.german: Verwende Alchemie, um fünf Tränke oder Öle herzustellen.
description.french: Utilisez l'alchimie pour préparer cinq potions ou huiles.
description.italian: Usa l'alchimia per creare 5 unguenti o pozioni.
description.spanish: Prepara 5 pociones o aceites mediante alquimia.

description.english: Kill more than one opponent using a single exploding bomb.
description.german: Töte mindestens zwei Gegner mit einer einzigen Bombendetonation.
description.french: Tuez plusieurs ennemis à l'aide d'une seule bombe.
description.italian: Elimina più di un nemico usando una singola bomba esplosiva.
description.spanish: Mata a más de un rival con una sola bomba explosiva.
description.russian: Убить больше одного противника взрывом одной бомбы.

description.english: Drink one potion.
description.german: Trink ein Elixier.
description.french: Buvez une potion.
description.italian: Bevi una pozione.
description.spanish: Bebe una poción.

description.english: Collect 10000 orens.
description.german: Sammle 10.000 Orens.
description.french: Obtenez 10 000 orins.
description.italian: Guadagna 10.000 oren.
description.spanish: Consigue 10.000 orens.

description.english: Enhance abilities using mutagens at least five times.
description.german: Steigere deine Fertigkeiten mindestens fünfmal mit Mutagenen.
description.french: Augmentez vos compétences au moins cinq fois à l'aide de mutagènes.
description.italian: Potenzia le tue abilità usando 5 sostanze mutagene.
description.spanish: Mejora habilidades usando mutágenos al menos 5 veces.
description.russian: Пять раз улучшить умения при помощи мутагенов.

description.english: Kill 500 foes.
description.german: Töte 500 Gegner.
description.french: Tuez 500 ennemis.
description.italian: Elimina 500 nemici.
description.spanish: Mata a 500 enemigos.

description.english: Perform three successful ripostes in a row.
description.german: Führe drei erfolgreiche Konter nacheinander aus.
description.french: Contre-attaquez trois fois d'affilée.
description.italian: Esegui tre contrattacchi di fila.
description.spanish: Ejecuta tres respuestas con éxito seguidas.

description.english: Kill a foe by deflecting his own arrow at him.
description.german: Töte einen Gegner, indem du seinen eigenen Pfeil auf ihn lenkst.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi en retournant sur lui sa propre flèche.
description.italian: Elimina un nemico deviando contro di lui la sua stessa freccia.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo haciendo que su flecha le rebote.
description.russian: Убить врага, отразив в него его собственную стрелу.

description.english: Kill three foes at once by performing a group finisher.
description.german: Töte drei Feinde auf einmal mit einem finalen Hieb gegen mehrere Gegner.
description.french: Tuez 3 ennemis d'une traite en portant un coup fatal de groupe.
description.italian: Elimina contemporaneamente 3 nemici con una mossa finale di gruppo.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos a la vez con un golpe de gracia en grupo.
description.russian: Убить трех противников одним добивающим ударом.

description.english: Kill 10 foes in a row without losing any Vitality.
description.german: Töte 10 Gegner nacheinander, ohne Vitalität zu verlieren.
description.french: Tuez 10 ennemis d'affilée sans perdre de Vitalité.
description.italian: Elimina 10 nemici di fila senza perdere vitalità.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos seguidos sin perder vitalidad.
description.russian: Убить 10 противников подряд, не потеряв здоровья.

description.english: Hit Count Etcheverry using the ballista.
description.german: Triff Graf Etcheverry mit der Balliste.
description.french: Tuez le comte Etcheverry avec la baliste.
description.italian: Colpisci il Conte Etcheverry usando la balista.
description.spanish: Ataca al conde Etcheverry usando la balista.

description.english: Successfully sneak through Loredo's garden and find the component of the kayran trap.
description.german: Schleich durch Loredos Garten, ohne dich erwischen zu lassen, und finde die Komponente der Kayranfalle.
description.french: Infiltrez-vous dans le jardin de Loredo.
description.italian: Infiltrati con successo nel giardino di Loredo.
description.spanish: Atraviesa a hurtadillas el jardín de Loredo.
description.russian: Успешно пробраться в сад Лоредо и найти часть ловушки на кейрана.

description.english: Find all additional information about the insane asylum's history.
description.german: Finde alle Zusatzinformationen über die Geschichte des Irrenhauses.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les informations complémentaires sur l'histoire de l'hôpital psychiatrique.
description.italian: Trova informazioni extra sulla storia del manicomio in rovina.
description.spanish: Busca toda la información que haya sobre la historia del manicomio.
description.russian: Найти все дополнительную информацию об истории лечебницы для душевнобольных.

description.english: Defeat all opponents in the Kaedweni arena.
description.german: Besiege alle Gegner in der kaedwenischen Arena.
description.french: Terrassez tous vos adversaires dans l'arène kaedwenienne.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti gli avversari dell'arena kaedweniana.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los rivales en la arena kaedweni.
description.russian: Победить всех противников на каэдвенской арене.

description.english: Seduce Ves.
description.german: Verführe Ves.
description.french: Séduisez Cyn.
description.italian: Seduci Ves.
description.spanish: Seduce a Ves.

description.english: Brew the ostmurk potion.
description.german: Braue das Elixier aus Schattenbeinwurz.
description.french: Préparez la potion à l'osmorose.
description.italian: Crea la pozione dell'ostmurk.
description.spanish: Prepara la poción de brumósea.

description.english: Tour the camp with Zyvik.
description.german: Erkunde mit Zyvik das Lager
description.french: Parcourez le camp avec Zyvik
description.italian: Esplora il campo insieme a Zyvik.
description.spanish: Recorre el campamento con Zyvik.
description.russian: Пройтись по лагерю в сопровождении Зывика.

description.english: Stop Roche from killing Henselt.
description.german: Halte Roche davon ab, Henselt zu töten.
description.french: Empêchez Roche de tuer Henselt.
description.italian: Impedisci a Roche di uccidere Henselt.
description.spanish: Impide que Roche mate a Henselt.

description.english: Spare all trolls in the game.
description.german: Verschone alle Trolle im Spiel.
description.french: Épargnez tous les trolls du jeu.
description.italian: Risparmia tutti i troll del gioco.
description.spanish: Libera a todos los trols del juego.
description.russian: Сохранить жизнь всем троллям в игре.

description.english: Kill all the trolls in the game.
description.german: Töte alle Trolle im Spiel.
description.french: Tuez tous les trolls dans le jeu.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i troll del gioco.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los trols de la partida.

description.english: Sneak through the lower camp without raising the alarm.
description.german: Schleich durch das untere Lager, ohne Alarm zu verursachen.
description.french: Infiltrez-vous dans le camp inférieur sans faire sonner l'alarme
description.italian: Infiltrati nel campo inferiore senza farti scoprire.
description.spanish: Atraviesa a hurtadillas el campamento inferior sin levantar la alarma.
description.russian: Пробраться через нижний лагерь, не поднимая тревоги.

description.english: Help Roche rescue Anais from the Kaedweni camp.
description.german: Hilf Roche, Anais aus dem kaedwenischen Lager zu retten.
description.french: Aidez Roche à sauver Anaïs du camp kaedwenien.
description.italian: Aiuta Roche a salvare Anais dal campo kaedweniano.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Roche a rescatar a Anais del campamento kaedweni.
description.russian: Помочь Роше в спасении Анаис из лагеря каэдвенцев.

description.english: Relive all of Auckes's memories in Dethmold's vision.
description.german: Durchlebe alle Erinnerungen von Egan in Detmolds Vision.
description.french: Revivez tous les souvenirs d'Auckes au travers de Detmold.
description.italian: Rivivi tutti i ricordi di Auckes nella visione di Dethmold.
description.spanish: Revive todos los recuerdos de Auckes en la visión de Dethmold.
description.russian: Увидеть все воспоминания Эгана с помощью Детмольда.

description.english: Help Iorveth find the dagger needed to free Saskia from the spell that holds her.
description.german: Hilf Iorweth, den Dolch zu finden, der Saskia vom Bann befreien kann.
description.french: Aidez Iorveth à trouver la dague permettant de libérer Saskia de son ensorcèlement.
description.italian: Aiuta Iorveth a trovare il pugnale necessario a spezzare l'incantesimo che grava su Saskia.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Iorveth a dar con el puñal necesario para liberar a Saskia del hechizo que pesa sobre ella.
description.russian: Помочь Иорвету найти кинжал, который поможет освободить Саскию от чар.

description.english: Leave Síle to die in the unstable portal.
description.german: Überlass Sheala im instabilen Portal dem Tod.
description.french: Laissez Sheala mourir dans son portail instable.
description.italian: Abbandona Sheala al suo destino nel portale instabile.
description.spanish: Deja que Sheala muera en el portal inestable.
description.russian: Оставить Шеалу умирать в нестабильном телепорте.

description.english: Save Síle from dying in the unstable portal.
description.german: Rette Sheala vor dem Tod im instabilen Portal.
description.french: Sauvez Sheala du portail instable.
description.italian: Salva Sheala dal portale instabile.
description.spanish: Impide que Sheala muera en el portal inestable.
description.russian: Спасти Шеалу от смерти в нестабильном портале.

description.english: Spare or save Saskia.
description.german: Verschone oder rette Saskia.
description.french: Épargnez ou sauvez Saskia.
description.italian: Risparmia o salva Saskia.
description.spanish: Libera o salva a Saskia.

description.english: Finish the game by killing Letho.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, indem du Letho tötest.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en tuant Letho.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco uccidendo Letho.
description.spanish: Acaba el juego matando a Letho.

description.english: Finish the game by sparing Letho.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, indem du Letho verschonst.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en épargnant Letho.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco risparmiando Letho.
description.spanish: Acaba el juego liberando a Letho.

description.english: Finish all quests involing the destruction of monster nests.
description.german: Schließe alle Quests ab, in denen Monsternester zerstört werden sollen.
description.french: Finissez toutes les quêtes impliquant la destruction de nids de monstres.
description.italian: Concludi tutte le missioni relative alla distruzione delle tane dei mostri.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de destruir nidos de monstruos.
description.russian: Завершить все задания, в которых нужно уничтожать логова чудовищ.

description.english: Win an arm wrestling match, a dice poker game and a fist fight.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde Armdrücken, eine Partie Würfelpoker und einen Faustkampf.
description.french: Remportez un bras de fer, une partie de poker aux dés et un combat à mains nues.
description.italian: Vinci una sfida a braccio di ferro, una partita a dadi o un incontro di lotta.
description.spanish: Gana un pulso, una partida de póquer de dados y una pelea de puñetazos.
description.russian: Одержать по одной победе в борьбе на руках, в покере и в кулачных боях.

description.english: Intimidate someone.
description.german: Schüchtere jemanden ein.
description.french: Intimidez quelqu'un.
description.italian: Intimidisci qualcuno.
description.spanish: Intimida a alguien.

description.english: Roll five-of-a-kind at dice poker.
description.german: Würfle beim Pokern einen Fünferpasch.
description.french: Obtenez cinq dés identiques au poker aux dés.
description.italian: Ottieni cinque numeri uguali a dadi.
description.spanish: Consigue un repóquer al póquer de dados.
description.russian: Играя в покер, выкинуть пять костей одного достоинства.

description.english: Reach the Epilogue of the game.
description.german: Erreich den Epilog des Spiels.
description.french: Terminez l'acte 3
description.italian: Concludi l'atto 3.
description.spanish: Acaba el tercer acto.

description.english: Bow before the Sun at a Summer Shrine.
description.german: Verneige dich bei einem Sommerschrein vor der Sonne.
description.french: Inclinez-vous devant le soleil près d'un Autel Estival
description.italian: Inchinati al sole presso un Altare dell'estate.
description.spanish: Póstrate ante el sol en un Santuario de Verano.

description.english: Bow to Death at a Winter Shrine.
description.german: Verneige dich bei einem Winterschrein vor dem Tod.
description.french: Inclinez-vous devant la mort près d'un Autel Hivernal
description.italian: Inchinati alla morte presso un Altare dell'inverno.
description.spanish: Póstrate ante la muerte en un Santuario de Invierno.
